The classical results

These results are the common natural results that have always existed in google.
Type name classical
Properties
  • A title
  • B targetUrl The url where we go when we click
  • webSite This is the domain of the target url (e.g. en.wikipedia.org) 
if($result->is("classical"){

    echo $result->position . " " . $result->title;

    if ($result->hasPicture()) {
        echo " [" . $result->pictureUrl . "]";
    }

}

Video Result

This is an illustrated video result that mays appear as first position in natural results
Type name video
Properties
  • A title
  • B targetUrl The url where we go when we click
  • webSite This is the domain of the target url (e.g. en.wikipedia.org) 
if($result->is("video"){

    echo $result->position . " " . $result->title;

}

Image group

These results are a list of images placed among natural results
This is a group result, you need to iterate over it to get single results
Type name imageGroup
Properties
  • targetUrl The url where we go when we click
  • webSite This is the domain of the target url (e.g. en.wikipedia.org) 
if($result->is("imageGroup"){

    foreach ($result->getItems() as $imgResult) {

        echo $result->position . " " . $result->website;

    }

}

In the news group

This a list of articles recently published (news). They are included in natural results
This is a group result, you need to iterate over it to get single results
Type name inTheNewsGroup
Properties
  • A title
  • B description
  • targetUrl The url where we go when we click
  • webSite This is the domain of the target url (e.g. en.wikipedia.org) 
if($result->is("inTheNewsGroup"){

    foreach ($result->getItems() as $newsResult) {

        echo $result->position . " " . $result->website;

    }

}

In depth article group

This a list of detailled articles included in natural results.
This is a group result, you need to iterate over it to get single results
Type name inDepthGroup
Properties
  • A title
  • B description
  • targetUrl The url where we go when we click
  • webSite This is the domain of the target url (e.g. en.wikipedia.org) 
if($result->is("inDepthGroup"){

    foreach ($result->getItems() as $newsResult) {

        echo $result->position . " " . $result->website;

    }

}
